item.title: @Simon Sinek
item.description: Author and speaker who’s book [[notes/Start with Why|Start with Why]]

item.title: second brain
item.description: The need for a second brain or [[notes/zettelkasten|zettelkasten]] began after I attempted my yearly review and found myself at a loss to manage the complexity and changes that had been accumulating from my learnings since starting [[Grownetics]] and watching the regulated [[cannabis]] market evolve.

item.title: Start with Why
item.description: As [[notes/@Simon Sinek|@Simon Sinek]] says, “Start with Why”. This simple yet powerful statement get to the root of motivation and readily encompasses values, mission, and impact goals.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my home on the web where I will be sharing notes and thoughts on subjects.

item.title: zettelkasten
item.description: A Zettelkasten or card file consists of small items of information stored on paper slips or cards that may be linked to each other through subject headings or other metadata such as numbers and tags.
